title: Pure-tou no Nakama-tachi (Serendipity the Pink Dragon)
synopsis: Kona is a boy who has a friend: a pink dragon named Serendipity with a kind nature. They want to stop the evil captain who tries steal gold from their peaceful island.
staff: [['Terada, Kenji', ['Script']], ['Matsuyama, Yuushi', ['Theme Song Arrangement']], ['Gotou, Takayuki', ['Key Animation']], ['Yonekawa, Koushin', ['Key Animation']]]
